techmeme.title: Google announces its Material 3 Expressive design, which it will roll out to Android and Wear OS, nearly four years after introducing Material You (Mindy Brooks/The Keyword)
Google announces Android 16 security features like expanded fraud detection in Messages, prevention of some actions while on calls, like side loading apps, more (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Global tablet shipments grew 8.5% YoY to 36.8M in Q1, led by consumer and education refresh cycles; Apple's market share grew 14% to 37%, above Samsung's 18% (Canalys)
FTC v. Meta: the US case may come down to whether Judge James Boasberg believes blockchain social platform MeWe is a closer competitor to Instagram than TikTok (Lauren Feiner/The Verge)
The US Commerce Department formally rescinds the Biden-era AI Diffusion Rule, which would have limited US AI chip exports and taken effect on May 13 (Rebecca Szkutak/TechCrunch)
